content.text: As a Senior Developer at Dynepic, Inc., I worked on scalable and secure software solutions for digital training and connected ecosystems. Focused on creating user-friendly interfaces and backend integrations for enterprise and government clients.

Contributed to the development of immersive training platforms using AR/VR technologies. Ensured seamless integration between front-end interfaces and backend services to support real-time interactions.
Implemented security and compliance updates to meet DoD and enterprise requirements. Developed user authentication and data protection workflows for secure information handling.
